ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:52:21 [Issue ID 4000-143652] urn:comicvine:4000-143652
ComicInfo.Summary: WE'VE MADE IT TO NUMBER TWO, PUDDIN' PANTS! As REX revels in his newly discovered powers to make whims a mechanical reality, both world-watching organization PROVIDENCE and sinister showman SIMON BABBAGE hatch plans for the ten year old titan. MIA saunters down from her ivory tower with lipstick and pepper spray to embark on a quest to find the boy who saved her life. Meanwhile, Agent SIX is handed his next assignment: He must destroy the greatest threat to mankind since gunpowder-- The boy called REX?!? Watch as all three collide in a bloody jambalia of madness and mayhem as the mystery of M-REX unfolds. Plus: WHO CAN WITHSTAND MALESTROM KNOWN AS MAXIMINION?!? WHO ARE THE KEEPERS OF THE CODEX MUNDI?!? WHAT ON GOD'S GREEN EARTH IS A BOBO HAHA, AND HOW CAN SOMETHING WITH SUCH A SILLY NAME HERALD THE END OF CIVILIZATION?!? Order now and order a lot... Please. It can't be the comic that'll save the world without you!
ComicInfo.Title: Size Matters
